East_Orange.Eighth Street Bridge (Passaic River):
Eighth Street Bridge is a road bridge over the Passaic River in northeastern New Jersey, United States. Opened in 1915 as a bascule bridge, the bridge was fixed in place in 1977.
The Eighth Street Bridge connects the City of Passaic in Passaic County with the Borough of Wallington in Bergen County and is jointly owned by both counties.
